itemDescription: British producer, director, writer and podcaster

wikipedia_page.main: Sol Harris (born 19 March 1990) is a British producer, director, writer and podcaster. He is best known as the producer of feature film Finding Fatimah and as host of the weekly film podcast "Diminishing Returns".

response: Producer, Sol Harris, and director, Oz Arshad, took the project to British Muslim TV where it was funded with the intent of being toured as a means of charity fundraising for Penny Appeal.
